1. Don't be an jerk. 2. Don't game the game, IE: Use waterwheels without a watersource. 3. All Structures must be supported, IE: no floating stockpile platforms. 3.1. Bridges can still float, but must have "support" columns for aesthetic purposes.
We hope you enjoy your stay!
If you would like to stay up to date on our changes be sure to join our Discord!
